channel.title: Work with Ian on HelpSpot
channel.description:
Hey Bootstrappers!
I know many of you here are still working full time while pursuing your longer term ambitions. We just opened up a new position at UserScape for a Software Engineer. Everyone who works at UserScape is very entrepreneurial and it's a trait I really love to see in employees.
If you're interested in doing meaningful work helping everyone from startups to large non-profits provide amazing support to their constituencies give it a look http://userscape.com/careers.html
Cheers,
Ian

Hey Bootstrappers!
